nodeList.loreText: The strength of the python and the venom of the cobra are yours to channel
nodeList.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that poisons the target. Requires a polearm.

Poisons inflicted by serpent strike last 40% longer.

nodeList.altText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node, then the highest threshold is used.
nodeList.description: Serpent Strike hits have a chance to instantly kill enemies that are below a threshold (a percentage of their maximum health).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Your hits with serpent strike instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold ([6%] of their maximum life per point).

node.altText:
The poisoning projectile inflicts poison on hit, that scales with your increases to poison damage and damage over time, but not with other nodes on this tree. The projectile does not deal any other damage on hit.

The poison duration penalty does apply to the projectile, but does not apply to other ailments that serpent strike may apply such as blinding poison.
node.description: Serpent Strike hits have a chance to cast {Poison Spit,} a projectile spell that poisons on hit, but poisons you inflict have reduced duration.
node.nodeDescription:
Release a poisoning projectile when you use serpent strike. 

Poison inflicted by serpent strike or the projectile has 35% reduced duration.

node.description: Serpent Strike has additional chance to poison enemies and poisons inflicted by Serpent Strike last longer.
node.nodeDescription:
Serpent strike has [10%] additional poison chance per point

node.nodeDescription:
A melee attack that poisons the target. Requires a polearm.

Poisons inflicted by serpent strike last 40% longer.

nodeList.description: {Primal Serpents} have increased attack speed and are granted health when they hit enemies with a melee attack.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Primal Serpents summoned by serpent strike have [10%] increased attack speed per point, and gain [10] health on melee hit per point.

node.altText: Primal serpents also gain 4% increased damage for each point of Strength or Dexterity.
node.description: When Serpent Strike kills an enemy, you have a chance to summon a {Primal Serpent}, a melee minion which poisons on hit.
node.nodeDescription: [7%] chance to summon a primal serpent on kill.

stats.statName: Chance To Summon Primal Serpent On Kill
Primal Serpent Health Granted On Melee Hit

nodeList.altText: This effect triggers when you kill an enemy and roll to summon.
nodeList.description: Instead of summoning a new serpent when the {Primal Serpent} node's effect triggers, you heal your current serpent to full health and it deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for 4 seconds.
nodeList.nodeDescription: If you already have a primal serpent, instead of summoning a new one you heal the existing serpent to full health and give it 50% increased damage for 4 seconds.

node.altText: Primal serpents also gain 4% increased damage for each point of Strength or Dexterity.
node.description: When Serpent Strike kills an enemy, you have a chance to summon a {Primal Serpent}, a melee minion which poisons on hit.
